description:
The 25th Master of the Moon Light Sword Style. She pretends to be a fragile high schooler, but she has been training since she was a child and has become a skilled sword player. She prefers guys who are tough and strong, because she`s been told that she needs to marry a man strong enough to help her resurrect her family`s sword style. For that reason, she`s participating in GOH.
Source: Official page
name: Yoo Mira
